briefTitle: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Paliperidone Extended-Release (ER) Tablets in Participants With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: Tolerability, Safety and Treatment Response of Flexible Doses of Paliperidone ER in Acutely Exacerbated Subjects With Schizophrenia
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the tolerability, safety and treatment response of flexible doses of paliperidone extended-release (ER; designed to slowly release a drug in the body over an extended period of time) tablets in participants with acute schizophrenia (psychiatric disorder with symptoms of emotional instability, detachment from reality, often with delusions and hallucinations, and withdrawal into the self).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Response Based on Total PANSS Scale Score
